thread.section_title: Wilson Amplifiers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Wilson Amplifiers | wilsonamplifiers.com
thread.title: Larry Burt
thread.title_full: Wilson Amplifiers reviewed by Larry Burt

author: Larry Burt
title: Larry Burt
text: We live up in the woods of northern Michigan. Cell phone service where we live is very poor that being we had one bar outside that would work sometimes. Zero to one bar inside that would work a little sometimes but not always and you had to be right tight to a window. I called Wilson, talked to Abdul about my problem and he recommended your model 470103. We are very happy with our purchase as we now have three and four bars of service. It was very cold the day we installed it and feel once warm weather comes and we can get back up to tweak the antenna direction we will most likely have a solid four bars.
